beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: AT&T used to have a monopoly on long-distance phone calls.
sentences.chinese: 过去，美国电话电报公司垄断了长话业务。

sentences.english: I'm to visit Mr. Williams from AT & T.
sentences.chinese: 我要拜访来自美国电话电报公司的威廉姆斯先生。

definition: Time Warner Inc., US media company
